column4: I cant seem to ssh into my desktop from my netbook, I try    ssh username@host      ssh username@public_ip    and  ssh public_ip         and it just times out. any ideas?
you do have the ssh server installed on the desktop? on the desktop box try 'ssh localhost'
i can ssh into localhost, but still getting timeout when I try remotely
ssh suports a -v and -vv and -vvv option to get vervbose error messages
